xf:constraint.value: if(string-length(@filename) gt 0) then if(@mediatype=('image/jpeg', 'image/pjpeg', 'image/png', 'application/pdf')) then true() else false() else true()
if(string-length(@filename) gt 0) then if(number(@size) le 3145728) then true() else false() else true()
